title: US education secretary to Florida LGBTQ kids: Got your back - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. US education secretary to Florida LGBTQ kids: Got your back  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Polls show Americans support FL education bill after ABC News poll declares unpopular when omitting key detail  Fox News
  3. Opponents Call It the ‘Don’t Say Gay’ Bill. Here’s What It Says.  The New York Times
  4. Florida's 'don't say gay' bill brought me back to Anita Bryant and 1977 | Column  Tampa Bay Times
  5. Legislature makes it easier to ban school books in Florida | Editorial  South Florida Sun Sentinel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: TALLAHASSEE, Fla. (AP) — In another clash between President Joe Biden’s administration and Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis, U.S. Education Secretary Miguel Cardona spoke with LGBTQ students to say the federal government supports them even if the governor does not.
